basics.name: Matthew Bergman
basics.label: Robotics and Computer Vision Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced in Perception for Mobile Robotics. Researching deep learning-based solutions for challenging computer vision problems on underwater robots.

work.name: Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN
work.summary: Conducting robotic perception research for underwater robots such as Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs).
highlights: Developed Perception Modules for AUVs using Python, Ubuntu, and ROS
Developed novel vision algorithms using Python, Ubuntu, and PyTorch
Performed field testing on underwater robots in local lakes.

Built and configured classroom robots, led labs, gave lectures, wrote exams, and provided technical support as TA
